remarks: The unique dimension axiom.  If a point is in ` N ` dimensional space and in ` M ` dimensional space, then ` N = M ` .  This axiom is not traditionally presented with Tarski's axioms, but we require it here as we are considering spaces in arbitrary dimensions.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Sep-2013.)
statement: axdimuniq $p |- ( ( ( N e. NN /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( M e. NN /\ A e. ( EE ` M ) ) ) -> N = M ) $.
